file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-05-06 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I LATERAL SIDE - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I LATERAL SIDE - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ACFT WITH CLASS-D BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the EWIS components in the rear fuselage I, lateral sides, for general condition. B. Related Zones: 271/272. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT WITH CLASS-D EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FU- BAGGAGE COMPART- 05-40-05-200-801-A ♦ SELAGE I (LATERAL SIDE) - INTERNAL MENT GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-05 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-05-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT WITH CLASS-D BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I (LATERAL SIDE) - INTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-212-005-A00. (3) You must do the internal general visual inspection (GVI) of rear fuselage I, at zones 271/272, within a touching distance of the engine generators power cable and wiring bundles. (4) The function of the internal general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. (5) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components during the inspections. (6) Refer to the Preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-05/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - WM 20-22-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Baggage compartment and rear elec- 271 tronic compartment - LH Baggage compartment and rear elec- 272 tronic compartment - RH 272 272DR Fuselage, rear section I - RH EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-05 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Flashlight To make the inspection of the area easier Standard Ladder To get access to the area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I - lateral side I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Get access to the cargo compartment. (3) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the rear electronic compartment. (4) Identify the baggage-compartment lateral internal panels of rear fuselage I, at sub- zone 270 ( AMM MPP 06-41-05/100), that give access to zones 271/272. (5) Remove the baggage-compartment lateral internal panels, from rear fuselage I, at sub- zone 270 ( AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400) to access zones 271/272. (6) Remove, if necessary, the thermoacoustic insulation from rear fuselage I, at zones 271/272 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). J. EWIS Components in the Rear Fuselage I (Lateral Side) - Internal General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a general visual inspection on the engine generators power cables, wiring bundles, and connected EWIS at Rear Fuselage I, LH and RH sides, for signs of damage, adequate installation, chafing and general condition. Refer to WM 20-22-00. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-05 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If you removed the thermoacoustic insulation, install it back at zones 271/272 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install the baggage-compartment lateral internal panels to rear fuselage I, at sub-zone 270 ( AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400), related to zones 271/272. (3) Install access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (4) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-40-05 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
